home.paragraph1: Barlingo is a language exchange app where users make exchanges in establishments and receive discounts.
home.paragraph2: If you want to practice languages ​​for free, join one of the exchanges published or create one to your liking. There are people like you willing to learn and have a good time.
home.paragraph3: If you have a business and you want to attract people who exchange languages, sign up.

success.title: Notify sent
success.message: The notification has been sent to all the users

error.title: Error
error.message: The notification could'nt be sent, try it later

deleteAccount.text1: This action is not reversible. It will permanently delete your account and personal data from the system.
deleteAccount.text2: To erase personal data enter your password.
deleteAccount.deleting: Your account and personal data are being deleting from the system, wait please.

loadErrorMessage: There was an error loading the data
ihaveread: I have read and I accept the
terms-intro: The terms and conditions of www.barlingo.es are detailed in this document.
terms-protection-text: Barlingo is committed to the security of its users' data. When we request personal information with which you can be identified, we do so by ensuring that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. Our website uses the information in order to provide the best possible service, particularly to maintain a user registry.
terms-rights-text: Barlingo is committed to comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). According to this law, we assure the user the following rights:
terms-right1: Users have the right to be notified of all breaches that result in a risk to their individual rights and freedoms. This will be done within a maximum period of 72 hours from the moment it occurs.
terms-right2: Users have the right to request that their data be deleted and that third parties stop processing it.
terms-right3: Users have the right to request their data in electronic format, so that they can carry this data to other companies.
terms-intellectual-property-text: The page and its original content, features and functionality are the property of Barlingo and are protected by international copyright, trademarks, patents, trade secrets and other laws of intellectual property or property rights.
terms-prices-title: Barlingo has three types of subscription to the service:
terms-price1: Monthly subscription: the price of the monthly subscription is € 6.99.
terms-price2: Quarterly subscription: the price of the quarterly subscription is 18.99 €. A discount of 10% is applied with respect to the monthly subscription.
terms-price3: Annual subscription: the price of the annual subscription is € 62.99. A discount of 25% is applied with respect to the monthly subscription.
terms-modifications-text: Barlingo reserves the right to modify at any time the terms and conditions of use of the portal.
adviseemail: We'll never share your email with anyone else
